Address: 37 S RIVER ST, AURORA, Illinois, 60507, United States of America
CompanyDescription: Old Second Bancorp, Inc. is a corporation organized under the laws of the State of Delaware in 1981 that serves as the bank holding company for its wholly-owned subsidiary bank, Old Second National Bank. Old Second National Bank (the "Bank") is a national banking association headquartered in Aurora, Illinois, that operates through 29 banking centers located in Cook, DeKalb, DuPage, Kane, Kendall, LaSalle and Will counties in Illinois. In this report, unless the context suggests otherwise, references to the "Company" refer to Old Second Bancorp, Inc. and references to "we," "us," and "our" mean the combined business of the Company, the Bank and its wholly-owned subsidiaries.  ...
